radiographic_examinations.findings: Confirmed the solitary liver mass, with contrast enhancement suggestive of hepatocellular carcinoma.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: In a subsequent MRI, further tumor expansion was detected.

radiographic_examinations.date: One year after the initial diagnosis
radiographic_examinations.findings: Showed radiotracer uptake in a 1.8-cm mass adjacent to the previously treated hepatic lesion; suggested recurrent or residual disease.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Revealed no intestinal uptake but indicated metastatic disease in a 1.5-cm periportal lymph node and in the right anterior iliac bone.
